name: Rebrand PRD Generator from Ralph to FADE and fix output format
description: The PRD Generator at prd-generator.ddns.net still references Ralph and outputs incorrect filename format. Need to rebrand to FADE and align output with FADE v0.2.2 conventions.

userStories.title: Rebrand UI from Ralph to FADE
userStories.description: As a user, I want the PRD Generator to be branded as FADE, not Ralph
acceptanceCriteria: Page title says 'FADE PRD Generator' not 'Ralph PRD Generator'
Header says 'FADE PRD Generator'
Footer says 'Compatible with FADE' not 'Compatible with Ralph'
Any Ralph links updated to FADE repo
Favicon updated if applicable

userStories.title: Update output filename convention
userStories.description: As a FADE user, I want the downloaded PRD to have the correct filename format
acceptanceCriteria: Filename format is {TYPE}-XXX-{slug}.json
TYPE is uppercase (FEAT, BUG, CHORE, ENH, SPIKE)
XXX is literal placeholder for user to replace
slug is kebab-case derived from feature name
Example: FEAT-XXX-user-authentication.json

userStories.title: Fix type mapping for Tech Debt
userStories.description: As a FADE user, I want Tech Debt PRDs to use 'chore' type not 'toil'
acceptanceCriteria: Tech Debt work type outputs "type": "chore"
Filename prefix for Tech Debt is CHORE-XXX-
All other types unchanged: feature, bug, enhancement, spike

userStories.title: Remove Ralph references from branchName
userStories.description: As a FADE user, I want branch name suggestions to not include 'ralph'
acceptanceCriteria: branchName field does not contain 'ralph/'
branchName uses format: {type}/{slug} (e.g., feature/user-authentication)
Or branchName field is removed entirely (optional for FADE)

userStories.title: Rename GitHub repository
userStories.description: As the maintainer, I want the repo name to reflect FADE branding
acceptanceCriteria: Repository renamed from ralph-prd-generator to fade-prd-generator
OR repository renamed to just prd-generator
GitHub redirects from old URL work
README updated with new repo name

userStories.title: Update README for FADE alignment
userStories.description: As a contributor, I want the README to explain FADE integration
acceptanceCriteria: README mentions FADE framework
Links to FADE repo: https://github.com/themitchelli/fade
Documents the PRD JSON structure expected by FADE
Documents filename convention
Removes or updates Ralph references
